title: East Coast Toast
description: A serial killer doing life without the possibility of parole is free after a freak accident. He picks up where he left off twelve years ago, only this time he takes a fifteen year old girl along for the ride. Things get wild as Mick forces his way to the east coast, using his violent skills to try and reach a beautiful place he's been reading about in an encyclopedia. Hold on . . . here come eccentric characters, startling developments, and twist after twist. Walker Newton has done it again!
author: Walker Newton
